title: US campus protests of Israeli ‘genocide’ offer hope to students from Gaza | Flipboard
text: US campus protests of Israeli ‘genocide’ offer hope to students from Gaza Student protests in the United States have caught the attention of students from Gaza, giving them hope for the future. On April 21, Hala Sharaf’s heart was heavy as she left her family in Gaza to resume her studies in Cairo, Egypt.
